name: Pine Park Health
headline: We provide primary care in senior living communities.
description:
We're a primary care practice that helps residents of senior living communities lead healthier, happy lives.

Our mission is to keep senior living residents healthy—by keeping them away from hospitals where exposure to health risks is high. Through our new clinical care delivery model, we bring clinicians right into senior living communities, providing safer, more convenient primary care. Pine Park partners with senior living communities to provide primary care to their residents, building a value-based care model where we keep patients healthier. This allows us to provide comprehensive healthcare on-site, see patients regularly, and better support their holistic health.
generated_description:
**Pine Park Health: Revolutionizing Senior Care**

Pine Park Health is a unique primary care provider founded in 2018, a brainchild of the Y Combinator Batch S18. Their mission is refreshingly straightforward: keep residents of senior living communities healthy and out of hospitals. By embedding clinical care directly into these communities, they minimize exposure to health risks. This approach turns traditional healthcare on its head, offering convenience, personal attention, and a more supportive environment for seniors.

### What They Do
Pine Park Health provides on-site primary care tailored specifically for older adults. Imagine having a dedicated healthcare professional come to your home or community regularly. This model not only limits the stress that comes from hospital visits but also emphasizes continuous care—keeping an eye on everything from diabetes to dementia.

The healthcare team, made up of 75 skilled employees based in Oakland, CA, collaborates closely with senior living staff to deliver a holistic healthcare experience. They offer a full suite of services: preventive care, chronic condition management, and even diagnostic testing—all aimed at making seniors feel their best without the hassle of traditional doctor’s office visits.

### How It Works
In practical terms: there are no extra fees for signing up, and they accept many forms of insurance, including Medicare and Medicare Advantage. This means that getting care doesn’t have to come with a financial burden—a refreshing change in an often convoluted healthcare landscape. 

In addition, Pine Park Health prioritizes rapid care. Their clinical support line is available 24/7—a reassuring safety net for any urgent health concerns, whether late at night or on weekends. 

### What's Unique
What sets Pine Park apart is not just in-home visits but also the intention behind these interactions. They seek to build relationships, understand patients deeply, and foster an environment where healthcare feels personalized rather than transactional. 

This embedded approach in the community translates into regular health programming and collaboration with Assisted Living or Memory Care staff as well, which helps promote overall quality of life.

### In Summary
Pine Park Health is redefining what primary care looks like for seniors. By taking healthcare where seniors live, they eliminate the barriers that often prevent older adults from receiving the care they need. The philosophy here is clear: deliver personalized, compassionate care that fits seamlessly into the lives of seniors, helping them thrive in their communities. 

For more information or to become a patient, visit their website: [Pine Park Health](http://pineparkhealth.com).
